conjurer:AeonianButterfly.FLAVOR: According to myth, these butterflies were once the wings of the Goddess of Rot herself.
conjurer:AeonianButterfly.NAME: Aeonian Butterfly

conjurer:BeastEye.FLAVOR: The murky violet iris writhes as if alive.
conjurer:BeastEye.NAME: Beast Eye

conjurer:Bloodrose.FLAVOR: Blood-slick roses that bloom in festering blood.
conjurer:Bloodrose.NAME: Bloodrose

DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies have {0}% less HP but start battle with [Metallicize] equal to {1}% of their HP. Whenever you break an enemy's [Block], apply {2} [Bruised] and [Blinded] to it.
conjurer:BreakGauge.NAME: Cleansing Bell

conjurer:CarpenterBug.FLAVOR: Despite the name, it'll probably destroy your furniture, not repair them.
conjurer:CarpenterBug.NAME: Carpenter Bug

conjurer:CelestialDew.FLAVOR: Once upon a time, the stars of the night sky guided fate, and this is a recollection of those times.
conjurer:CelestialDew.NAME: Celestial Dew

conjurer:CleansingBell.FLAVOR: It seems to have a life of its own, even as you hold it in your hand...
conjurer:CleansingBell.NAME: Cleansing Bell

conjurer:ConcertsFinalHour.FLAVOR: Everything has an end, and the troupe was no exception.
conjurer:ConcertsFinalHour.NAME: Concert's Final Hour

conjurer:CrimsonMapleLeaf.FLAVOR: On this mountain path, where the red leaves lifeless lie... My heart calls for a companion, echoing the deer's cry...
conjurer:CrimsonMapleLeaf.NAME: Crimson Maple Leaf

conjurer:CrimsonwhorlBubbletear.FLAVOR: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
conjurer:CrimsonwhorlBubbletear.NAME: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear

conjurer:DarkMoonRing.FLAVOR: Whoever thou mayest be, take not the ring from this place, the solitude beyond the night is better mine alone.
conjurer:DarkMoonRing.NAME: Dark Moon Ring

conjurer:Dendroculus.FLAVOR: A substance that has accumulated intense Dendro energy.
conjurer:Dendroculus.NAME: Dendroculus

DESCRIPTIONS: {#o:Right-Click in battle}: Target a creature and take its form. | At combat start, trigger an effect dependent on your current form.
conjurer:DisguisePropBox.FLAVOR: You can be whoever you want to be.
conjurer:DisguisePropBox.NAME: Disguise Prop Box

DESCRIPTIONS: You may reroll cards from card rewards into cards with altered stats. | Entering #yRest rooms gives #b1 use per #b{0} cards in the pool.
conjurer:EntropicDie.FLAVOR: Think about the food you want to eat the most.
conjurer:EntropicDie.NAME: Entropic Die

DESCRIPTIONS: [Malleable] is treated as [conjurer:Ventus] and [conjurer:Petra]. All characters start battle with {0} [Malleable].
conjurer:Everamber.FLAVOR: Inside the amber, a small, long-extinct insect remains frozen in time.
conjurer:Everamber.NAME: Everamber

DESCRIPTIONS: Significantly boosts rare card reward chances from the next #b{0} monster rewards.
conjurer:FortuneGlue.NAME: Fortune Glue

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a room, there is a #b{0}% chance to obtain a random relic. If this activates, there is a #b{1}% chance for you to lose #b{2}% of your current HP, and disable this relic.
conjurer:GalacticBigLotto.FLAVOR: You just need one galactic currency to bet on your luck and become a trader in the experience of making dreams.
conjurer:GalacticBigLotto.NAME: Galactic Big Lotto

conjurer:GapFoldingUmbrella.FLAVOR: Covers everything from tears to torrents.
conjurer:GapFoldingUmbrella.NAME: Gap Folding Umbrella

conjurer:GhastlySendOffLantern.FLAVOR: It scares things off a bit too well.
conjurer:GhastlySendOffLantern.NAME: Ghastly Send-Off Lantern

conjurer:HeavyGem.FLAVOR: A warrior can appreciate a heavy weapon.
conjurer:HeavyGem.NAME: Heavy Gem

conjurer:HellBull.FLAVOR: A drink that oozes with hell.
conjurer:HellBull.NAME: Hell Bull

conjurer:InsectWeb.FLAVOR: Touching this web carries a high risk of becoming infected by the parasitic larvae.
conjurer:InsectWeb.NAME: Insect Web

conjurer:JumpyDumptyPartyPopper.FLAVOR: It jumps and it dumps. What more can be said?
conjurer:JumpyDumptyPartyPopper.NAME: Jumpy Dumpty Party Popper

conjurer:KeyOfTheMoonBathedDeep.FLAVOR: A strange treasure with an awkward name.
conjurer:KeyOfTheMoonBathedDeep.NAME: Key of the Moon-Bathed Deep

conjurer:MaidensFleetingLeisure.FLAVOR: This flower shall be my medal. That is all I need.
conjurer:MaidensFleetingLeisure.NAME: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure

conjurer:NimbleFabric.FLAVOR: It moves too fast for you to wear it.
conjurer:NimbleFabric.NAME: Nimble Fabric

conjurer:NymphsConstancy.FLAVOR: A test piece created by piecing together the rejected components of various devices.
conjurer:NymphsConstancy.NAME: Nymph's Constancy

conjurer:Paintball.FLAVOR: Splat is where it is at.
conjurer:Paintball.NAME: Paintball

conjurer:PearlCage.FLAVOR: Only this bright pearl was lost in the rippling tumult, returning to the silent solitude of the depths.
conjurer:PearlCage.NAME: Pearl Cage

conjurer:PeriodicTable.FLAVOR: A table that repeats itself every so often.
conjurer:PeriodicTable.NAME: Periodic Table

DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can only #yLevel #b1 #yElement each combat.
conjurer:PunitiveEnergy.FLAVOR: You feel a surge of courage just by looking at it.
conjurer:PunitiveEnergy.NAME: Punitive Energy

conjurer:QuadraticGlobe.FLAVOR: The globe can spin any way you want it to.
conjurer:QuadraticGlobe.NAME: Quadratic Globe

DESCRIPTIONS: [Poison] is treated as [conjurer:Ventus]. At the end of round, [Poison] triggers an additional time and is cut in half.
conjurer:ScorpionStinger.NAME: Scorpion Stinger

conjurer:SpaceTimePrism.FLAVOR: Every hole is an individual surface, and reflections from each prism surface produce a different effect.
conjurer:SpaceTimePrism.NAME: Space-Time Prism

conjurer:StochasticTable.FLAVOR: A table that is very, very unpredictable.
conjurer:StochasticTable.NAME: Stochastic Table

conjurer:SummonFile.FLAVOR: We have all of your information.
conjurer:SummonFile.NAME: Summon File

conjurer:SundialOfEnduringJade.FLAVOR: It silently pursues both time and tide.
conjurer:SundialOfEnduringJade.NAME: Sundial of Enduring Jade

conjurer:SunlightMedal.FLAVOR: Reminds one of the great honor of a shared victory.
conjurer:SunlightMedal.NAME: Sunlight Medal

DESCRIPTIONS: You may reroll cards from card rewards into cards with altered stats. | Entering #yRest rooms gives #b1 use per #b{0} cards in the pool.
conjurer:SuppressingEdict.FLAVOR: What on earth did you do to make this fellow go mad?
conjurer:SuppressingEdict.NAME: Suppressing Edict

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, #ySummon #b1 of #b{0} special #ySummons. There is a small chance for the chosen #ySummon to appear in that room's card rewards.
conjurer:ThousandFloatingDreams.FLAVOR: In the reflection of the serene moonlight, the verdant lamp told of the silhouette of the stars and an everlasting melody.
conjurer:ThousandFloatingDreams.NAME: A Thousand Floating Dreams

DESCRIPTIONS: [A-R] now #yReacts with [A-G]. [Malleable] is treated as [conjurer:Ventus]. Start each battle with {0} [Malleable].
conjurer:TinyCastle.FLAVOR: Inside the amber, a small, long-extinct insect remains frozen in time.
conjurer:TinyCastle.NAME: Tiny Castle

DESCRIPTIONS: Disables [A-O]. [A-R] now #yReacts with [A-G]. If you would apply [conjurer:Petra], gain it as [Next Turn Block] instead.

conjurer:Triquetra.NAME: Triquetra

conjurer:UpliftingAromatic.NAME: Uplifting Aromatic

conjurer:ViridescentArrowFeather.NAME: Viridescent Arrow Feather

DESCRIPTIONS: randomize the values of the effects of cards in your hand

conjurer:WarpingCompoundEye.NAME: Warping Compound Eye

conjurer:WitchsHeartFlames.FLAVOR: A clear bottle containing liquid fire.
